lexUnit.name: nod.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to allow (one's head) to fall, droop

sentence.text: Don Peters smiled and nodded his head .
Margaret nodded her head vigorously .
Omally nodded his head .
The other boys nod their heads in agreement .
We all nodded our heads in agreement .
Jack nodded a few times to himself .
Baldwin nodded assent to both propositions .
His eyes flared over Maggie as he nodded her to a seat .
One of them nodded a greeting to Susan .
Lawton nodded his agreement .
Julie nodded a greeting .
The managing director nodded his understanding .
The Council , or what was left of it now , nodded wisely although frankly none of them understood or cared much about mechanical things .
It was Mubarak who made the observation , and Rostov nodded .
Waiting while his shop takings were checked and deposited , Ewan Dean nodded through the glass partition .
She nodded her agreement and glanced up proudly at her father .
From the altar the priest nodded a smile of recognition to the best man .
He nodded his thanks and the men laid her back on the table .
He nodded at Charlie .
As he introduced them , the two women nodded at each other .
He nodded slowly at Shag .
Father Devlin nodded in agreement .
She nodded in concern .
He nodded in the direction of Esther Ahilar 's little car , parked in the driveway .
Blanche nodded in a conciliatory way .
Freddy nodded reassuringly to his friends .
Gabriel nodded eagerly to himself .
I nodded to Keith .
He ignored Devlin and nodded formally to Schellenberg .
He put his finger to his lips , and nodded towards his passenger .
Blanche nodded with genuine compassion .
She nodded with enthsiasm .
She nodded with a sudden feeling of excitement .
Kirov nodded with satisfaction .
I nodded bitterly behind the door .
Blanche winked at Dexter and nodded for him to follow her outside with his coat .
She nodded past his shoulder .
He paused to light another cigarette , then nodded through his scratched windscreen .
He nodded sympathetically before hurrying off to discharge more pressing duties .
The fat man beamed and nodded happily before hurrying away .
She nodded to where Eline was standing .
She nodded without speaking .
The Bishop nodded encouragingly .
His head sags , nods once , jerks up again .
The most senior officer nodded profoundly .
Joseph nodded ; he knew what Katherine Lundy was like .
Patrick nodded , unsure what to say .
